Author: grossenten98
Text: Tbh, I think OMAD can be risky when people restrict with it but don’t get hard on yourself, hopefully at least you didn’t do the 10k kcal challenge like I once did lmao

Author: Dalos_
Text: I have absolutely no idea how much a regular person eats in a day. I have my view of eating little, but in treatment they gave us massive portions that I swear no real person could eat despite them saying it was normal. And now I’m so lost on how people eat I feel like giving up ever finding out
